title: Newick's Lobster House Dinner Offer
description: Dinner offer at Newick's Lobster House. Get $2.50 back when you spend $25 or more on dinner entrees.

content.restaurant_description: Newick's Lobster House is a seafood restaurant serving Dinner Bay Scallops ($23.00), Dinner Calamari ($23.00), Dinner Chicken Tenders ($18.00), Dinner Strips ($25.00), Dinner Coconut Shrimp ($22.00), Dinner Fantail Shrimp ($21.00), Dinner Gulf Shrimp ($21.00), Dinner Filet of Haddock ($25.00), Dinner Haddock Nuggets ($21.00), Dinner Sea Scallops ($52.00), Dinner Whole Clams ($52.00), Baked Scallops ($52.00), Baked Stuffed Haddock ($28.00), Broiled Haddock ($26.00), Fettuccine Alfredo ($13.00), Haddock Au Gratin ($19.00), Lobster Au Gratin ($43.00), Lobster Flat Bread ($33.00), Lobster Pie ($44.00), Lobster Stuffed Haddock ($43.00), Shrimp Flat Bread ($11.00), Shrimp Stuffed Haddock ($29.00), Steak Tips Street Maple Bourbon ($28.00), 1 1/2 Triple Lobster ($118.00), Snow Crab Legs ($51.99), Seafood Casserole Small ($23.99), Seafood Casserole Large ($33.99), Fried Lobster tails ($32.99) and more. Open 11:00 am - 7:30 pm. Located in 431 Dover Point Rd, Dover, NH 03820.

restrictions: Valid for dine-in and takeout orders
Cannot be combined with other offers

attribution.instructions: Upload your receipt after dining to receive your bounty
